e: ￹`Ma~`solinga'~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `noya~ `tamdaw~.￺That person's heart is at ease / has wholeness.￻那個人的心情很安逸
￹`Solinga'en~ `ko~ `pi~`na'ang~ `tonini~ `a~ `tilid~.￺Put this writing away in complete order.￻把這本書收藏好
￹`Papi~`solinga'~`en~ `cingra~ `to~ `tayal~ `nira~.￺Make him do his work well and completely.￻叫他徹底的做好他的工作
d.f: ￹￺to do perfectly * well and completely￻完整，有秩序的，完全，圓滿的
